players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."

Bob: "

"
You: "Charlie was a good person, and I'm sad he's gone. We should work together to figure out who killed him."
You: "Let's work together to figure out who killed Charlie. We have a lot of information from last night, and I think we can piece it together."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night, and Alice is telling us to work together. I don't trust her."
Bob: remained silent.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."

You: "

"
Alice: "Charlie was a good person, and I'm sad he's gone. We should work together to figure out who killed him."
Alice: "Let's work together to figure out who killed Charlie. We have a lot of information from last night, and I think we can piece it together."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night, and Alice is telling us to work together. I don't trust her."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
